Title: Relates to the care and collection of animals on vacant property
Summary: Relates to the care and collection of abandoned animals on vacant property; requires notification to the appropriate authorities by anyone authorized to be on vacant land where such person finds an animal which based on its physical appearance or lack of available food or water appears abandoned, within six hours of an encounter.
LawCode: Amd ยง373, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to the care and collection of animals on vacant property
